If you or someone you know is struggling with mental health, there are resources available.

NYC Well is a free program with counselors available 24/7, in more than 200 languages.

Health insurance is not required, click here for info.https://t.co/G5hrsigRPZ

The COVID-19 pandemic is worsening the mental health crisis.

Because of the stigma around mental illness too many people are scared or embarrassed to seek help.

May is Mental Health Awareness Month, during this time we break the stigma & stand behind those that are struggling.
